posts.author: Vince67
posts.content: I have been playing on Kharlindale for about 4 years now. Low magic setting, lots of quests, no pvp unless agreed upon prior between players. Real friendly community. Think it is listed under pw action "a new pw". No haks needed.

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content: I play on WoG now, have played on others before, but nothing has ever come close to the level of customization and amount of hard work put on by the DMs to make it continuously better. Truly awesome!

posts.author: Templar
posts.content:
arelith here.

Positives: no hak's required, a three server world of cordor, surface and underdark
custom language system, custom crafting system, Low magic (+3 max unless you have a caster buff your weapon/armor/shield) Custom disguise system, extra races, unique buffing of spell focus's, etc, etc

Negatives: role playing Rating set by DM's who watch you rp is required for a few races but all the fun ones are free to play. devistating crit disabled and other feats/skills/spells have been changed a bit. read the wiki for more info if you want or ask me questions.

More info here http://wiki.arelith.com/Main_Page

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
Templar wrote:arelith here.

Low magic (+3 max unless you have a caster buff your weapon/armor/shield)
devistating crit disabled

More info here http://wiki.arelith.com/Main_Page
I recommend that all guild fans of Arelith consolidate their knowledge and post a concise overview of all and any server customizations that may directly effect build considerations. This PW subforum is the perfect place to list this information. Few of us who don't play a custom server have the time to acquaint ourselves with specialized rules but still would like to contribute something useful to a custom build request if the info is at our fingertips (page load on the forumer is extremely fast!). The back 'n forth banter (via posting or PM) to gradually reveal the details is counter-productive, unnecessarily tedious and slow, IMHO.

posts.author: trebusze
posts.content: Recently started on Blackstone Keep and it's fairy OK. Quite a number of people playing, down to exping and questing with RP close to none existing :P One issue i have tho, there is some wicked crafting system that requires you to build a crafter build or use aid of other player who build one them self. posts.author: Luck_Dragon
posts.content: Been runnin on aventia: 216.15.141.82:5121, for about a month now. . . .so far great server. They call it unlimited level mainly because you progress lvl 40 and keep going. New player created areas are added (the latest area is designed for toons level 1500 and above). To reach a level that high from what I can tell it would take about 1000 X level to reach the next level. To go from level 50 to level 51 would take about 51,000 exp, so level 100 to 101 would be 101,000 exp. The baddies are tough but the exp is great, party safe for spells, etc. Website = http://aventia3.freeforums.net/, worth a look as it never gets to be the same server running a new toon.
